name: Address-Distance-Calculator
description: Address Distance Calculator C# ASP.NET Core Web API for creating, reading, updating and deleting addresses, and calculating the distance in kilometers between Dutch addresses using the Bing Maps REST API and GeoCoordinatePortable.  .NET 5 · ASP.NET Core Web API · Entity Framework Core · SQLite · Bing Maps REST Locations API

name: AvanSync
description: AvanSync is a C++ client–server application that demonstrates core concepts from the CPPLS2 course: networking, concurrency, modular design and unit testing. The repository is structured as a Visual Studio solution with three main projects:

name: Broadway-Boogie-Weggie
description: School assignment Advanced Algorithms – a desktop application that demonstrates and visualizes different algorithms, built with C# .NET and WPF.

name: Cafeteria-Churreria-San-Pedro
description: Website for Cafeteria Churreria San Pedro in Tenerife

name: CodePen
description: Small CodePen project - Spinning DJ table with CSS/JS

name: DevOps
description: DevOps project that ties together a small API, frontend and a full Docker-based infrastructure with reverse proxying, monitoring and CI/CD.

name: Dimitri
description: This repository contains the code and configuration for the Dimitri project, created as part of a software-architecture course. The focus of the project is on clean modular design, separation of concerns and applying common architectural patterns in C++.

name: Ecobit-Internship
description: A C#/.NET multi-project solution created as part of a third-year internship at Ecobit (Nijmegen). The project showcases a layered architecture with separation between UI, Domain, and Database logic.

name: elegant-barbershop
description: Website suggestion for Elegant Barbershop

name: Flat-Galaxy-Society
description: Flat Galaxy Society is a C#/.NET project that models this alternative universe. It was created as an Advanced Design Patterns assignment and demonstrates clean architecture, object-oriented modeling, and test-driven development inside a playful, fictional domain.

name: Image-Compare-API
description: Node.js REST API that compares the similarity between images using the Imagga image recognition service.  This project was originally built as a Cloud Services assignment

name: Imgur-App-Android
description: Android Imgur client built in Java as the final assignment for a Mobile Development Android course. The app demonstrates consuming a REST API, working with lists and detail views, and following common Android architecture patterns.

name: Imgur-App-iOS
description: Simple native Imgur client for iOS, written in Swift. This project was created as an educational / exam assignment and demonstrates how to consume the Imgur API, display image feeds, and present image details in a clean UIKit app.

name: kmintapp
description: kmintapp is a C++ application built on top of a reusable simulation framework (libkmint). It is an agent-based 2D simulation: autonomous entities move around a world, make decisions based on their environment, and interact according to simple rules. The project was built as an educational / course assignment

name: Kolonisten-van-Catan
description: A Java implementation of (parts of) The Settlers of Catan, created as a project for Informatics 1 – Group I. This is an Eclipse-based project focused on practicing object-oriented programming, teamwork, and Git workflows.

name: Linear-Algebra
description: Linear Algebra – Space Simulation (IIIN-LINAL) Linal Eindopdracht for the course Lineaire Algebra (IIIN-LINAL) Made using C++ and SDL. Author: Ferran Hendriks

name: meinlager
description: Website suggestion for Mein Lager

name: Monsterzoo
description: Monsterzoo is a small browser-based JavaScript game built as a final assignment. You manage a zoo full of monsters: create them, customize them, place them on different fields, and move or delete them while dealing with changing weather conditions.

name: Munchkin
description: We have made this website as an assignment from Avans Hogeschool in 's-Hertogenbosch. copyright 2017 © Ferran Hendiks & Xia de Visser

name: Niks-voor-Niks
description: Niks voor Niks is a local trade marketplace where members of a trade ring can offer and request products and services using their own virtual currency called Niksen.  This application was originally built as a school project for a real client, following Scrum / agile practices, and implemented as a full-featured Laravel 7 web application.

name: pso-wiiu-guide
description: Guide how to setup and play Phantasy Star Online EPI+II on WiiU

name: Speuren-met-Krul-2020
description: A C++ console application that follows a chain of online clues, fetches and interprets a custom mini-language called Krul, and ultimately reveals a hidden secret message. This project was created as the CPPLS1 final project (Eindopdracht).

name: Speuren-met-Krul-2021
description: C++ console application created in 2021 as part of a school assignment by Ferran Hendriks (2130858).

name: Study-Mate
description: Study-Mate is a Laravel 7 web application that lets you manage everything around a school or course program in one place: courses, teachers, exams and grades (CRUD). It was built as a final assignment (Eindopdracht) to practice full-stack Laravel development.

name: Sudoku-Design-Patterns
description: A comprehensive Sudoku application built in C# as an exercise in object-oriented design and classic design patterns. You can solve Sudokus, use hints, and play different variants (classic, other grid sizes, Samurai, Jigsaw).

name: VideoShare
description: ASP.NET Core & Entity Framework Core solution for a layered video sharing web application.
